quest.name: I Drink, Therefore I Am (in Trouble)
journal:
 Quest Sync
The wild-eyed miner is afraid for his life.
objectives: Speak with the wild-eyed miner again.

dialogue.name: MINER03493
dialogue.text: No, don't hit me! Oh wait, you're not Guthlaugur.

dialogue.name: MINER03493
dialogue.text: He's a local thug who I made the mistake of drinking with. I ended up saying all sorts of things like, “Think you're tough, do you? My mate could wipe the floor with you!” Gods only know why I said that─ There ain't a word of truth in it!

dialogue.name: MINER03493
dialogue.text: Of course, he didn't see the funny side. He told me to bring this friend of mine or he'd fight me instead!

dialogue.name: MINER03493
dialogue.text: So, I was wondering... Could you go and sort him out for me? I'll make it worth your while, I swear!

dialogue.name: GUTHLAUGUR
dialogue.text: So, you're gonna “wipe the floor” with me, are you?

dialogue.name: MINER03493
dialogue.text: I brought herhim, just like I said I would!

dialogue.name: GUTHLAUGUR
dialogue.text: Hmph! Scrawny streak of piss like you? Don't make me laugh.

dialogue.name: GUTHLAUGUR
dialogue.text: I've killed sin eaters with my bare hands, so you won't even make me break a sweat.

dialogue.name: GUTHLAUGUR
dialogue.text: And after I'm done with this feeble sack of shite, you're next!

dialogue.name: GUTHLAUGUR
dialogue.text: Since I'm feelin' generous, I'll let you take the first swing. Better make it a good one, 'cause you won't get a second chance!

dialogue.name: MINER03493
dialogue.text: If you lose, I'm a dead man!

dialogue.name: GUTHLAUGUR
dialogue.text: Stop pummeling me! It's really painful!

dialogue.name: MINER03493
dialogue.text: Bloody hells! You actually did it! All right, let's head back before any of the wildlife takes an interest in us.

dialogue.name: MINER03493
dialogue.text: That ought to take him down a peg or two. I doubt he'll stick around here after a beating like that.

dialogue.name: MINER03493
dialogue.text: And I'll have to choose who I drink with more carefully from now on. I've got a habit of saying all sorts of nonsense when I'm in my cups.

dialogue.name: MINER03493
dialogue.text: It damn near earned me an early grave, and I'm lucky that you showed up when you did. Many thanks to you!
